Body:
"""
    Check that errors are raised when compulsory parameters are missing, but
    not when non-compulsory ones are.
    """
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    n_s=0.96)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, h=0.7, A_s=2.1e-09,
    n_s=0.96)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=2.1e-09,
    n_s=0.96)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, Omega_k=None)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, w0=None)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, wa=None)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    n_s=0.8, A_s=2.1e-09, sigma8=0.7)
assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
    n_s=0.8)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=None, df_mg=None)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=None)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, df_mg=None)
